summary: This documentary follows the lives and careers of a collective group of Do-it-yourself artists and designers who inadvertently affected the art world.
cast: Julian Bennett Holmes|Thomas Campbell|Shepard Fairey|Jo Jackson|Chris Johanson|Margaret Kilgallen|Harmony Korine|Geoff McFetridge|Barry McGee|Mike Mills|Stephen Powers II|Claire E. Rojas|Aaron Rose|Deanna Templeton|Ed Templeton
title: Beautiful Losers
